glTarget.role: Target an img HTMLContent by its id attribute to display the same picture than on this one

glSave.role: id attribute of a HTMLForm  or any container which will send datas in base64 format to a server for saving
glSave.attention: img must have a name attribute in this case.

glProtect.role: Define if the picture is downloadable or not
glProtect.attention: img must have width and height attributes or width and height defined styles
